description:
Batzz quits the tournament, but Dai Kaido does his best to convince him to stay. Gaito decides to use a mysterious new Impact in his next match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gaito is...? Kaido is...? The Death Sentence Approaches!
Gaito ka!? Kaidou ka!? Semarushi no Senkoku!!
ガイトか!? 海道か!? 迫る死の宣告!!
